document_data.caption: A map showing the Pool of Yeven in the Yevenwood.
document_data.name: Pool of Yeven
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pool of Yeven''' was a small lake found within the [[Yevenwood]] in [[Battledale]].
document_data.Geography: The Pool of Yeven was located due east of [[Lake Sember]] and south of [[Cormanthor]] near the center of the Yevenwood. The lake was fed by the mighty [[River Ashaba]] as well as the [[Semberflow]] and [[Glaemril]].
